personalInfo.title: Senior Frontend Engineer
personalInfo.motto: Crafting exceptional digital experiences with precision and passion.

profileSummary.fullText: Dedicated and skilled frontend developer with over 5 years of experience, expert in React.js and TypeScript, and advanced experience in Next.js leveraging SSR, SSG. Proven ability to translate design concepts from Figma into pixel-perfect, interactive user interfaces. Strong focus on building high-performance, reusable components, implementing animations, while ensuring robust cross-browser compatibility.
profileSummary.elevatorPitch: Highly motivated Frontend Developer with 5+ years crafting high-performance, pixel-perfect UIs using React, TypeScript, and Next.js. Proven in delivering scalable solutions, optimizing performance, and leading teams in dynamic environments. Excels at translating complex requirements into intuitive user experiences.
keyStrengths: Expertise in React Ecosystem (React.js, Next.js, Redux, Zustand, TypeScript)
Building Scalable, Maintainable & Reusable Frontend Architectures
Pixel-Perfect UI Development from Figma Designs

keyHighlights.highlight: Led a small team in the end-to-end development and launch of the 'Stella' social network (React/React Native), incorporating real-time chat (WebSocket) and video calls (WebRTC).
keyHighlights.impact: Successfully delivered a complex, cross-platform application fostering real-time user engagement in a specific market niche.

keyHighlights.highlight: Optimized the WebUI Data Virtualization platform (TIBCO), significantly improving rendering speed and interactivity for large, complex datasets.
keyHighlights.impact: Enhanced user experience by reducing data visualization load times by an estimated 20-25% for large datasets, enabling smoother data interaction.

keyHighlights.highlight: Designed and maintained a large, reusable React component library with TypeScript for TIBCO, adopted by a multi-national team, improving consistency and development velocity.
keyHighlights.impact: Streamlined UI development, reduced code duplication by ~30%, and facilitated faster feature implementation across the team.

keyHighlights.highlight: Effectively collaborated with UX/UI designers (using Figma) and backend developers to translate intricate user requirements, like the visual data filtering node interface, into functional and intuitive frontend features.
keyHighlights.impact: Ensured seamless integration and a cohesive user experience, delivering features that met both user needs and technical specifications.

education.institution: Posts and Telecommunications Institute of Technology

projects.projectDescription: Responsible for the frontend maintenance and development of company's public websites and internal Human Resource Management system.
responsibilities: Contributed to the maintenance and development of the frontend for company websites and the HRM system.
Participated in the frontend development process from the design phase to deployment and maintenance.
Ensured the quality and performance of the user interface across various web projects.
keyContributions: Implemented new features for the HRM system using React and Next.js.
Refactored legacy code to improve performance and maintainability.
Collaborated with backend team to define API contracts for new functionalities.

achievements.description: Ensured high uptime and performance for company websites.
achievements.quantification: Maintained >99.9% uptime and optimized page loads.

achievements.description: Improved developer experience by introducing Zustand for state management in the HRM system.
achievements.quantification: Simplified state logic compared to previous solutions.

challengesFaced: Integrating new features into existing codebases.
Ensuring consistent UI/UX across different company web properties.
technicalDecisions: Utilized Mantine component library for rapid UI development in the HRM system.
Adopted Zustand for lightweight global state management needs.
projects.impactStatement: Maintaining and enhancing the company's digital presence and internal operational tools through robust frontend development.

projects.projectDescription: Developed a user-friendly data virtualization platform enabling non-IT users to interact with complex datasets visually using React.js and TypeScript.
responsibilities: Developed the platform using React.js and TypeScript.
Designed and implemented a user-friendly filtering node interface using React.js components and Material-UI.
Collaborated closely with UX/UI designers and product managers on requirements and mockups (Figma).
Developed and maintained a large codebase of reusable React.js components and TypeScript modules for a multi-national team.
Implemented state management and data synchronization using Redux.
Collaborated with backend developers on API requirements and data exchange.
keyContributions: Architected and implemented the core visual data filtering module.
Championed TypeScript adoption within the project for enhanced code quality.
Developed and documented a significant portion of the shared component library.
Proactively identified and resolved key performance bottlenecks related to large data rendering.

achievements.description: Enabled non-technical users to perform complex data filtering visually, reducing reliance on IT.
achievements.metric: User Task Completion Time / IT Support Requests
achievements.quantification: Estimated 40% reduction in effort for common filtering tasks.

achievements.description: Significantly improved frontend performance for large dataset interactions.
achievements.quantification: Achieved ~20-25% faster rendering for datasets >1M rows.

achievements.description: Contributed to a high-quality, maintainable codebase used by a global team.
achievements.quantification: Maintained low post-release bug rates via testing and reviews.

challengesFaced: Managing complex, interconnected state using Redux for real-time data synchronization.
Optimizing performance for potentially massive and nested datasets.
Ensuring UI consistency and accessibility across diverse user environments.
Effective collaboration within a geographically distributed, multi-national team.
technicalDecisions: Selected Redux for robust state management of complex, shared application state.
Adopted Material-UI for its comprehensive component suite and design consistency.
Implemented lazy loading and virtualization for performance-critical components.
projects.impactStatement: Empowered business users with intuitive data interaction tools, enhancing data accessibility and operational efficiency within the TIBCO EBX platform.

projects.projectDescription: Collaborated on enhancing features and maintaining the frontend of the Zalora e-commerce platform.
responsibilities: Collaborated with a multidisciplinary team to develop Zalora website features.
Integrated Contentful CMS for dynamic content management (product listings, descriptions, images).
Designed and implemented reusable UI components and patterns using ReactJS following atomic design.
Utilized Storybook for component-driven development, documentation, and visual testing.
keyContributions: Implemented key UI components for product display and filtering.
Integrated Contentful CMS, enabling content updates by non-technical staff.
Contributed to the Storybook library, improving UI consistency and testing efficiency.

achievements.description: Enabled efficient content updates via CMS integration.
achievements.quantification: Reduced time for marketing team to update promotions by ~50%.

achievements.description: Improved code reusability and maintainability with atomic design components.
achievements.quantification: Accelerated development of new UI elements.

achievements.description: Enhanced UI consistency and quality using Storybook.
achievements.metric: UI Bugs Reported / Design Consistency Score
achievements.quantification: Reduced visual regressions through component testing.

challengesFaced: Working within a large, existing codebase.
Ensuring high performance and responsiveness for an e-commerce platform.
Integrating with multiple third-party services and APIs.
technicalDecisions: Leveraged Contentful's API for flexible content delivery.
Adopted Storybook for robust UI component development lifecycle.
projects.impactStatement: Contributed to enhancing the user experience and operational efficiency of the Zalora e-commerce platform through frontend development and CMS integration.

projects.projectName: Stella - Japanese Social Network for Fortune Tellers
projects.projectDescription: Led a small team developing 'Stella', a unique Japanese social network connecting fortune tellers and users via web and mobile apps, featuring real-time chat and video calls.
responsibilities: Led a small team in frontend development (ReactJS for Web, React Native for Mobile).
Implemented responsive UIs ensuring consistency across web, Android, and iOS.
Integrated WebSocket for real-time chat/notifications and WebRTC for audio/video calls.
Architected and maintained frontend codebase, optimizing for performance and scalability.
Ensured cross-browser/cross-platform compatibility and call quality optimization.
Utilized AWS services for CI/CD pipelines.
keyContributions: Led technical design and implementation of the React/React Native frontend.
Successfully integrated and optimized WebRTC for stable real-time calls.
Established automated CI/CD pipelines using AWS CodePipeline/CodeBuild.
Mentored junior team members on React/React Native best practices.

achievements.description: Successfully launched a complex, cross-platform social network from concept to production.
achievements.quantification: Achieved 4.5+ star rating within months of launch.

achievements.description: Implemented reliable real-time chat and notification system.
Enabled seamless peer-to-peer audio/video calling within the app.
achievements.quantification: >95% call connection success across diverse networks.

challengesFaced: Managing state consistency and code sharing between ReactJS and React Native.
Optimizing WebRTC performance and stability across various devices/networks.
Leading and coordinating a small team to meet project deadlines.
technicalDecisions: Chose React Native for cross-platform mobile development efficiency.
Utilized WebSocket/Socket.IO for scalable real-time messaging.
Leveraged AWS CI/CD for automated build and deployment processes.
projects.impactStatement: Created a unique platform connecting a niche community in Japan through innovative real-time communication features on both web and mobile.
leadershipResponsibilities: Led daily stand-ups and sprint planning.

projects.projectDescription: Contributed to developing 'To-U', a Japanese streaming network for artists, utilizing Vue.js with Nuxt.js framework.
responsibilities: Contributed to the frontend development using Vue.js and Nuxt.js.
Designed and implemented frontend components and pages following best practices.
Worked closely with backend developers for API integration.
Collaborated with UX/UI designers to translate mockups into interactive interfaces.
keyContributions: Developed key UI sections like artist profiles and streaming player interface.
Implemented state management solutions within the Vue/Nuxt application.
Ensured frontend components were modular and performant.

achievements.description: Contributed to the successful launch of the streaming platform.
Ensured visually appealing UI consistent with brand guidelines.
achievements.quantification: Received positive feedback on UI implementation.

challengesFaced: Adapting to Vue.js/Nuxt.js after focusing primarily on React.
technicalDecisions: Utilized Nuxt.js features for server-side rendering and routing.
projects.impactStatement: Played a role in building a dedicated streaming platform for Japanese artists, contributing to its frontend foundation.

projects.projectDescription: Developed a responsive website for Bao Nam Clinic, featuring appointment scheduling, patient registration, and interactive maps.
responsibilities: Collaborated with design and backend teams to develop the clinic website.
Translated mockups/wireframes into pixel-perfect, cross-browser compatible UI using HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript, PHP.
Implemented frontend functionality for appointment scheduling, patient forms, and interactive maps.
keyContributions: Built the core UI layout and components for the website.
Implemented interactive elements like appointment forms using JavaScript/jQuery.
Ensured cross-browser compatibility for key user flows.

achievements.description: Delivered a functional and responsive clinic website meeting design specifications.
achievements.quantification: Completed assigned frontend tasks within deadlines.

achievements.description: Implemented key patient interaction features like appointment scheduling.
achievements.quantification: Successfully integrated frontend forms with backend logic.

challengesFaced: Ensuring pixel-perfect implementation across various browsers.
Working with a mix of frontend (JS/jQuery) and backend (PHP) logic.
technicalDecisions: Utilized Bootstrap framework for rapid responsive layout development.
projects.impactStatement: Created the online presence for Bao Nam Clinic, enabling patients to find information and schedule appointments easily.

skills.name: React.js
specificApplications: Hooks, Context API, Performance Profiling, Component Architecture

assets.name: Bravery
assets.description: Unafraid of failure, I embrace challenges and eagerly explore new frontiers, fostering innovation and growth.

assets.name: Rational Humility
assets.description: Rational humility is the foundation of learning. I always believe that I have not arrived, I still need to improve myself, learn new things.

assets.name: Growth Mindset
assets.description: I believe that with dedication, effort and a willingness to learn from mistakes, I can improve and achieve my goals.

assets.name: Open-mindedness
assets.description: Open-minded and receptive to diverse perspectives, fostering collaboration and innovation.

assets.name: Responsibility
assets.description: I consistently uphold a strong sense of responsibility in all tasks, ensuring deadlines are met and projects are executed with precision and accountability.

assets.name: Problem-solving
assets.description: Equipped with strong problem-solving skills, I adeptly analyze challenges and develop effective solutions, driving projects forward even in the face of complexity.

assets.name: Dedication
assets.description: Dedicated to achieving excellence, I approach every task with unwavering commitment, investing time and effort to deliver results that exceed expectations.

assets.name: Innovative Thinking
assets.description: Through innovative thinking, I continuously explore new ideas and approaches, driving forward-thinking solutions and fostering a culture of creativity within teams.

assets.name: Self-awareness
assets.description: Maintaining a high level of self-awareness, I actively seek feedback and reflect on my actions, allowing me to adapt and grow professionally.

assets.name: Collaboration
assets.description: As a collaborative team member, I thrive in environments where collective efforts lead to shared success, leveraging diverse perspectives to achieve common goals.

interests.name: Learning Technologies
interests.details: Continuously exploring new frameworks, libraries, and paradigms in web development.

contributionsAndActivities.name: Hacktoberfest 2022 Participation
contributionsAndActivities.description: Participated in Hacktoberfest 2022, contributing bug fixes and minor components to various open-source repositories related to React and web development.
